Name: Vision Therapy VR
About the game: Vision Therapy is a convenient VR tool to keep eyes strong and healthy. It contains simple visual guidance to sets of 5 exercises randomly put together for a single session. Each set includes classical techniques which ensure that your eye muscles work proper: tense when necessary and relaxed when it’s time. Stunning scenery helps to leave all distractions behind and stay fully immersed in training. It’s easy, fun, beautiful. VR should and can serve our well-being. Healthier eyes – brighter life.
